Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: Oh Goodness, it’s been so long since a child has visited us in these woods!

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: Dear Girl, we don’t mean to alarm you...

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: But you have unknowingly doomed us all!

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: The Thorn King! You’ve revived him! He will conquer us all!!!

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Stop it!

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Ugghhhh, you’re going to freak her out...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Everything is “not doomed” yet... there is still a chance...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Dear Girl, would you please stay to listen to our story?

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Thank you... Let me explain...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: We are the Pixies. We call this forest our home.

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: With our magic, we can fly, we can grow plants, we can talk to animals...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: But most importantly, we can hide from humans.

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: You humans are awful and scary..

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: You pollute our land, you litter in our streams, your smoke fills the air!! It’s awful!

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: Thank Goodness for our magic, we can isolate ourselves, hide ourselves from your world.

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: However... there is one exception...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Our Pixie magic is strong, yes, but there is one force even stronger...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: A child...not yet tainted by the woes of the human world... a child with a pure heart, and a powerful imagination..

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: That child’s magic... Their... Whimsy...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: It allows them to travel into our world.

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: Yeah...I guess some of you guys are alright...

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: Plus, you are helpful.

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: We have built our own kingdom using our own magic, but it takes a lot of work

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: A child’s whimsy could rebuild 5 of our kingdoms and make them stronger than ever before!

Lamina.speaker: Lamina
Lamina.line: And if you don’t wish to doom us... To save us from the terror of the Thorn King, we need that whimsy of yours...

Lamina.speaker: Hedera
Lamina.line: Follow us, we will help you build your power.

Peggy.speaker: Player
Peggy.line: Sorry, Peggy. Didn’t mean to sneak up.

Peggy.speaker: Peggy
Peggy.line: It’s fine. Just keep your sword sheathed.
